trans-unit.source: Defines the base class for classes in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar"></xref> namespace that correspond to the elements in an SRGS grammar.
trans-unit.target: 定義中的類別的基底類別<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar"> </xref> SRGS 文法中的項目對應的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The SrgsElement class is the base class for the following classes, which correspond to elements defined in the [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761): - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> Two additional classes inherit from SrgsElement and represent the text contained within the classes listed above (SrgsText), and recognition matching modes (SrgsSubset): - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSubset> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText>
trans-unit.target: SrgsElement 類別是對應至項目中定義的下列類別的基底類別[語音辨識文法規格 (SRGS) 1.0 版](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761):- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>-<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>兩個額外的類別繼承自 SrgsElement 和代表 (SrgsText)，上面所列的類別中包含的文字和比對模式 (SrgsSubset) 辨識:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSubset>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSubset> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement"></xref>類別。
